text: ØIF Arendal Elite is a Norwegian handball team located in Arendal. Their home matches are played at Sparebanken Sør Amfi. They compete in Eliteserien, which is the highest league for men's handball clubs in Norway. ==European record== {| class="wikitable" ! Season ! Competition ! Round ! Club ! 1st leg ! 2nd leg !
